      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(double timeout,
                       @NonNull
                       FadingTextView.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets the length of time to wait between text changes in specific time units
        Parameters:
        timeout - The length of time to wait between text change
        timeUnit - The time unit to use for the timeout parameter Must be of FadingTextView.TimeUnit type
